item.title: Air quality measurements
item.description: Air quality measurements Near real-time national air quality data from measuring stations - the air quality data provides information on the levels of various air pollutants, including particles, nitrogen dioxide and ground-level ozone, in Swedish cities and in rural areas. The data is made available via a HTTP/REST API with various usage examples. The data is provided in cooperation with SMHI. See Luftkvaliteten i realtid och prelimin√§r statistik for more information (Swedish).
